system.description:
Your disparate training further expands your options in a fight, making you into a lethal collection of battlefield surprises. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you score a critical hit, you may choose to forfeit the extra damage and gain a point of exertion instead.

  • Choose a weapon you are proficient with. It becomes an adept weapon for you.

  • Melee weapons you wield gain the Thrown property with a range of 20/40.

  • You can use a shield with the Martial Arts feature.
